meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Poland.
meanings.sent1: In Poland, you can use zlotys to buy things.
meanings.sent2: She exchanged her dollars for zlotys at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The zlotys in his pocket jingled as he walked.
meanings.sent4: Her savings in zlotys were like a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The shiny zlotys gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A sum of money in the currency of Poland.
meanings.sent1: He received a large amount of zlotys as a gift.
meanings.sent2: The price of the item was quoted in zlotys.
meanings.sent3: She found a hidden stash of zlotys under her bed.
meanings.sent4: The zlotys in his wallet seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent5: The sound of zlotys clinking together was music to his ears.
